extendedInfo.description: The Eurochannel app offers the best in European movies, documentaries, TV series and music with English subtitles.  Get instant access to a library of 200+ programs of your favorite European content available only through the Eurochannel app. View full-length, uncut and commercial-free European programs right in your living room on Google TV or on your Android tablet or smartphone.Google Play and Amazon users are raving about the hottest new app available:'A pretty impressive library.' TechJaws.com'Netflix for European movies. Outstanding!' Joseph'Amazing! Plenty of movies with excellent image quality! 'Gusalf' I sincerely look forward to coming home and watching my European Channel. It is excellent.' Lloyd Stevenson'Works great! Easy to navigate; excellent broad-ranging content for my interests.' Olivia Petrini di Monforte'Great foreign TV and movies. Cannot find a better selection.' Vonnie Planisek 'The app I've been waiting for, totally worth the 8 bucks per month investment.' Steed3003Check more of our outstanding reviews below!* Watch full-length European movies and TV series.* FREE to download app, FREE 7 day trial.* Unlimited, instant viewing catalogue.* Exclusive Google TV premieres - Watch it first on Google TV!* New movies, documentaries TV episodes and music programs added weekly. * All the music you love: One Direction, Tokio Hotel, David Guetta* Genres including: comedy, documentary, drama, history, thriller. * Optimized for phones, tablets and Google TV. * Browse Eurocinema, Euroseries, Euromusic, Euromagazine, Eurotravel.* App works in US and Canada.* Unsubscribe instantlyAll this for only $7.99/month! Even better, you can try it now one week for free!CURRENT MOVIES AND TV PROGRAMS:MOVIES More than 100 movies currently available including: OPERATION DANUBE (POLAND), EVET, I DO (GERMANY), SHADES OF HAPPINESS (FINLAND), WONDERFUL AND LOVED BY ALL (SWEDEN), SHOP OF DREAMS (ESTONIA), THE LAST SUMMER (BELGIUM), THE 40TH DOOR (AZERBAIJAN), THE TWO LIVES OF ANDRES RABADAN (SPAIN), KONTAKT (MACEDONIA), LETTER TO AMERICA (BULGARIA), THE LAST SOVIET MOVIE (LATVIA/AUSTRIA), FACING THE ENEMY (SLOVAKIA), SCAPEGOAT (IRELAND), THE IDIOT RETURNS (CZECH REPUBLIC), THE MYSTERY OF SINTRA (PORTUGAL), THE TALE OF THE PINK BUNNY (KAZAKHSTAN), ELEPHANT (RUSSIA)DOCUMENTARIESMore than 60 documentaries currently available including: FANTASTIC ROME (ITALY), THE BEAST OF THE VOSGES (FRANCE), WORKING CLASS BALLET (LATVIA), THE CIRCUS TOUR (ESTONIA), TOTALLY PERSONNAL (BOSNIA & HERZEGOVINA), THE WRITING IN THE SKY (IRELAND), HIGHLAND CLANS (SCOTLAND), KINGS OF SPAIN (SPAIN), THE UNKNOWN ISLANDS (PORTUGAL), THE WILD MAN (NORWAY), ALL NATURALS (ITALY), A MAN FROM MUNKACZ (HUNGARY), DA CAPO: PABLO SARASATE (BELGIUM)TV SERIES New TV series: THE CLASS - LIFE AFTER (ESTONIA), UNDERWORLD TRILOGY (FINLAND) and HOME/WORK (WALES), PROSPERITY (IRELAND), TORPEDO (NORWAY)New music programs: Exclusive interviews with ED SHEERAN, SWEDISH HOUSE MAFIA and TIZIANO FERROYou can have immediate access to all this content: install the app and start your 7 day free trial!

reviews.title: Great app for foreign movies lovers like me
reviews.comment: A huge and exclusive library of movies, TV series and documentaries at a great price, and all with English subtitles. If you like independant stuff like me, look no further, Eurochannel is just awesome and works flawlessly!
reviews.author: elena pellerin

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Lots of force closes on the third reviews page.  Sad to see that 50% of the reviews come from cheap, illiterate douches, likely having no sense on how to even use their own device.
reviews.author: Marcello Velocci

reviews.title: unsubscribe
reviews.comment: how can I cancel my subscription ? cant found any info on euro site or on internet .
reviews.author: Roberto Afanase

reviews.title: Not for me
reviews.comment: To compare with Netflix is insulting at best.  Have nothing to say good about, what i watched not english, poorly dialoged etc..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: You are aggressive with Nexus device offer, than you ask for credit card to activate FREE trial!? For what? I\'m not sure that I would love to keep app on my device. And be honest - tell your guys to slow down with amazed reviews. They doesn\'t look real.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: They should tell you that it cost to use it!
reviews.author: Jon Silla

reviews.title: EuroChannel and Google+ Review
reviews.comment: I use Eurochannel on my TV with Logitech Revue.  Works great!  Easy to navigate; excellent broad-ranging content for my interests. I also have other foreign channels but Eurochannel has english subtitles.  Allows commercial free viewing and allows one to broaden interests to other parts of the world rather than some of the trash shown on US television interrupted with commercials every 3 or 4 minutes. I THOROUGHLY ENJOY EUROCHANNEL.  Excellent content considering the small monthly charge.  I also have had good experience with Google+, hangouts, etc., on both the Logitech Revue on both TV and mobile devices.  On EuroChannel I view mostly EuroCine (movies), EuroMagazine (history and documentaries).  Not so much TV shows or series.  As stated, I am very pleased and have no complaints.
reviews.author: Lloyd Stevenson

reviews.title: The Eurochannel und Ich
reviews.comment: ...are now good friends.With the Eurochannel, I discovered Polish sense of humor in \302\253Lullaby\302\273 and found it hilarious. I saw my \302\253old friend\302\273 Bruno Ganz, still a great actor, in \302\253The Day of the Cat\302\273; there\'s not a chance I would have seen him on regular TV.  I visited the Azores and listened to Brandao\'s description being read in a Portuguese which I totally recognized.  I don\'t have much time to watch TV, but I sincerely look forward to coming home and watching my European Channel.  It is excellent.
reviews.author: Olivia Petrini di Monforte

reviews.title: Can\'t see content
reviews.comment: I\'m not willing to install and give credit card details out just to find out what is playing in this app.  What is your line up. How much of it is UK TV?  Give me a channel line up and list of programs and ill give it a  shot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Eurochannel works great on the new Sony Google TV, no issues with any of the video\'s. Nice job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Europe at my hands!
reviews.comment: Amazing! Plenty of movies with excellent image quality! Great on my brand new Nexus 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Netflix for European movies Outstanding!
reviews.comment: I LOVE THIS APP!!! A must have for foreign movies and TV lover, with an amazing library offering tons of European films, TV series and documentaries on instant streaming and also the live channel. A lot of content all subtitled in English and without any commercials. The app works flawlessly on all my Android devices. The Eurochannel app rules!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the quality, movies, & shows
reviews.comment: The video quality on this app is great and I had no problem streaming the live feed. Really nice and fun to watch on the go. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dane
reviews.comment: Having TV in my pocket is pretty amazing! Quality is better than I thought and this app is quite handy. Feels like watching it from home!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you Eurochannel!!!
reviews.comment: I can\'t thank you enough for allowing me to watch eurochannel online!  I have a Google TV buddy box and also an Android based smartphone and the quality looks amazing on both.  Video-on-demand is convenient and it is so easy to search and find my favorite shows!  Lastly, the interactive guide simply pushes it over the top!  Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!  If you are already a lover of European culture or simply want to expand and expose yourself to the best in European movies / music from the best European actors, actresses and musicians, then you have to check this channel out.  Did I say thank you yet? :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on Droid Pro
reviews.comment: Quality app, pretty excited about being able to watch Underworld Trilogy episodes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: Just works perfect. It is definitely 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User
